name: Gem server
body:
## Private gem server based on geminabox

### Install
```
  git@github.com:tnitsche/gem_server.git
  bundle install --path .bundle
```
### For local usage
```
  bundle exec rake init
  bundle exec rake gem_server:start
```
### For remote deploy
```
  bundle exe cap deploy
```
There's a System V init script in bin/ for startup/shutdown
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
